author: Ross Burden
method: Preheat the oven to 180C/350F/Gas 4. Mix all the ingredients together to form a smooth paste.  Spread the paste onto a piece of baking parchment and bake in the oven for five minutes or until golden. Remove from the oven and while still warm, shape biscuits into desired shape.
ingredients: 2 free-range egg whites,  85g/3oz plain flour,  100g/3Â½oz sugar
